nodes.text: Conversations With Lanius is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on October 23, 2003 and took the form of an interview of Jedi Master Lanius Qel-Bertuk by Yara Grugara and another reporter. In the interview, Qel-Bertuk responded to criticisms that the Jedi were not doing enough in the Cularin system and argued that Jedi are not as different from non-Force sensitives as many believe; they search for meaning in their lives just as others do.
In 2005, another article with the title Conversations With Lanius was released on Wizards.com.
